about_the_game:
Embark on a global journey with the game “Guess the Flag! DEMO”

Guess the flag! is a quiz/trivia game that tests your knowledge of flags!


Test your knowledge of 255 countries, islands and international organizations in DEMO version with 1 addictive modes. Test your memory by matching the flag to the name of a country.

If you get bored with the mode with lives, you can raise the adrenaline level by choosing the settings of the time game.
The game is divided into regions such as World, Europe, Asia, South America, North America, Australia and Oceania.

Master all the flags, race against time and become the greatest flag expert.

DEMO Features:

6 game modes:
- Match the name

Two game styles:
- Game with Time
- Game with lives

Modes available in full version:
- Match the name
- Match the flag
- Writing mode
- Location mode
- Daily challenge
- Random mode


Regions:
World, Europe, Asia, South America, North America, Australia and Oceania
